description: Home of the Morning Coffee Enema and the Cuny Trim and Spa.Sacred Space returns to the Playa for the third year in a row.Discover the Health and Pleasure of a morning coffee enema;Also available is a refreshing Green Tea Enema.

name: Safer Sex Camp
description: Source of Safer Sex Kits. All your playa safer sex needs. Distributors needed – all orientations most welcome (guys, this means YOU). Drop by Safer Sex Camp early am or e-mail with playa contact info. Your opportunity to be part of the gift economy.  Kits have condoms, lube, gloves, plastic for dams.  All kits are free, not for sale, not for barter.  Demos? – that’s your call.

name: Sakénoma
description: Sakénoma is a seasonal saké bar and modern day stage coach stop, located in BRC NV.  It appears like a mirage in late August and then fades away without a trace.  We serve ice-cold saké during the hottest part of the day and close at night. The refreshment we provide has helped to establish Sakénoma as the premiere Saké bar on the playa. The slight acidity of the saké pairs nicely with the alkaline properties of playa dust.  Our bar is an oasis of calm in an otherwise chaotic world. The encampment provides shade and liquid refreshments to any playa traveler.  Our cascading fountains provide an audible lanscape of tranquility and has been known to transport the open minded to an alpine waterfall.  In addition to the obvious health benefits of Sakénoma and its famous cold saké, we also offer advanced eyewear cleaning.  We welcome you to visit Sakénoma, leave refreshed and see the world more clearly.

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil provides a welcoming space for personal exploration and self-expression through mental (air), physical (earth), emotional (water) and spiritual (fire) interaction with other beings. Conjuring the four elements through the medium of human experience, we invite the Burning Man community to join us in our quiet, reflective triple Do-Me Dome to explore the emotional and mental underside of your previous night’s playa play.    Ponder your possible futures with one of our clairvoyant soothsayers or discuss the mysteries of the universe with other philosophically-oriented burners. Add to your list of escapades by coming to our second annual fire opera — Burning Hope/Naked Fear — performed within our mirrored poi spinning circle. Also look for the debut of Salon Soleil on wheels with this year’s new Buddhavehicle, bringing you a special delivery of enlightenment. Whether your mind is most alert by day or by night, whether you prefer the intimate company of a single confidant or crave some heavy inter-groupulation, Salon Soleil offers a space to enhance your Burning Man experience.

name: Sample
description: The future.  Hope or fear it all you want, but when the apocalypse comes, the Tiki Gods will rise again! They will command you to lounge and drink, right in the "Yes! Have Some" camp. Sacrifice your sobriety to the Angry Tiki Gods during the sundown rituals each evening at the Post-Apocalyptic Tiki Lounge. Partake in a variety of Tiki games devised by the mischievous Gods of Island lore themselves… or just come by and hang out for a spell with the haves and have-somes.

name: Satan’s Lair
description: Satan’s Lair is a combination of activities and campers from all over.  We have perfected the fine living of knowing that a job well done will (practically) do itself!  This year’s Asylum theme is Hell.  We’re the builders, the dreamers and literally the Hell Raisers.  The camps have underlying sins.  We put ours right out there.  Satan’s Lair will be building Hell and volunteering in different ways for the community-at-large.We also have smaller camps of 2-6 people that will be providing interactiveamusement!  Please stop by & see what we’re up to!

name: SCARAB
description: In addition to providing staffing for Radio Electra, SCARAB (Society for Creative Arts & Radio at Burning Man) prides itself on its unique art pieces and art vehicles, interactive events, and dedication to the Principles of Deep Fun.  Now in its 5th year as a spin-off of the Solo Collective, this yearâ€™s camp theme ties directly to the overall BM art theme, and is symbolized by two Shiva figures having a tug-of-war between “hope” and “fear.”  Variations on this theme will appear in camp events and art projects.  SCARAB is also the home of WaltSnipeâ€™s annual Tuesday night community dance, with a different world music theme every year and free CDs of the nightâ€™s mix to the first 50 dancers.

name: Secret Exchange
description: Come into our Confessional.  Give a secret, get a secret

name: Serenity Giant Game Camp
description: Come and join us at our GIANT SIZE GAME CAMP. Picture a giant size game of Connect four or a Checker Board you have to walk on to move your pieces from one space to another. Bring some old friends or maybe new friends you may meet along the way. At our game camp you can release your inner child in a BIG way and we will offer you nice cool cup of Ice tea (please bring your own cup.Look for our SERENITY GIANT GAME CAMP flag.

name: Shadow Chamber
description: The Shadow Chamber is ambient chills space the surrounds the viewer in a landscape of flowing shadows and atmospheric music. Inside this space will be a room that contains a series of spinning and rotating shadow projectors creating a powerful and immersive visual experience. Brought to you by the Quixotic Project.

name: Shady Asylum
description: Shady Asylum is a collection of worn souls building comfort and community in Black Rock City for over six years.  Our friendly and open camp offers the city’s only bit of shaded live grass under that easy to spot big black pyramid.  Come and say hello, get some frozen otter pops, climb the tower to look out over the city, and add your offering to the stone soup community we’re brewing.  If you can clean up after yourself, treat yourself and others well, and have a story to tell come join us.  And that story part is optional.

name: Shine Brothers
description: A hands on demonstration and workshop on the art of making Moonshine – or Grappa in Old World slang. Participants can witness the marvel of creation, and if interest and contributions continue, the exhibition will continue daily.

name: Shuttlecraft "Galileo
description: The shuttlecraft "Galileo" is the home base of a faithful reproduction of the 60’s era shuttlecraft used in TOS "Star Trek". C’mon by and let’s go for a ride! You don’t have to be a geek, dweeb, spaz or nerd to appreciate the shuttlecraft "Galileo"!

name: Signs of the Times
description: Hope and Fear… dichotomies that make one’s outlook on the future a foreseeable prophecy. We will be making signs to be placed all across Black Rock City so that people may choose their path in life. Some will be obvious antonyms. Others will be more difficult choices creating personal dilemmas. Remember, it is the journey, not the destination.

name: Sloth Camp
description: We are hopeful people. We do not come from the land of plenty. We are Sloths. Although we appear to be slow – we have highly evolved brains and we do not fear the future, we embrace it. We challenge ourselves to move everyday (some days are better then others). Were it not for the interactive nature of our camp – we could perish before the end of the week. Please come by and share your thoughts – slowly. Bring us your wit and walk away knowing that you may have saved a sloth from distinction.  Our future lay in your hands. Won’t you help a sloth today (Sally Struthers helped us once)?

name: slushicamp
description: VIRGIN ALERT !!!!  small two or three man camp with comercial slushi machine, and sound system.would make a great side camp to a larger theme or village maybe even inside one. Note: I have never been to burningman before, Iam a constant festival partier and have done years of burning man studying. I will be prepared foe the conditions, am a big time outdoorsman, having lived in AK for yaers now from MN will be bringing 250 gal tank of water and 20-30 gal of vodka for slushi machine, I AM NOT GOING TO CHARGE FOR SLUSHIS

name: Smoochdome
description: The Smoochdome is a chill space with a mission–to be the best place to smooch on the playa! Bring your partner (or find one here), settle into our cozy atmosphere, and enjoy! What are you waiting for?

name: Smores N Amour
description: Come by for S’mores and hugs.  Look for our mobile firepit to be cooking S’mores at our camp just after sundown or out on the playa at other times.

name: Snheath Factory & Employee Lounge
description: The Snheath Factory & Employee Lounge provides an oasis for the sustainable organic manufacture and fair-trade distribution of shade-grown hypo-allergenic handmade snheaths.

name: Snow Koan Camp
description: We seek the burning man in the desert with a snow cone that lasts a week. Join us for mindless koans, endless jones, random tones, and exceptional snowcones.

name: Snowflake Village
description: Celebrating 7 years of Midwest wackiness. Insane Docktors, Pole Dancing, Speed Dating, Bars, Weddings, Paintings, and naughty movies. You could spend your whole life here.

name: Snuggletown!
description: Snuggletown! provides a safe comfortable, inviting space for people to meet the universal human need for human touch.  this year, we hope to meet a need, to change lives, and to encourage safe nurturing heart centered touch on the playa.

name: Sophisticated Dare Delivery
description: Sophisticated Dare Delivery. Distinguished, Discrete, Discriminating. Delivering your fancy dares and terrifying truths around the playa in style. Featuring potentially deadly champagne fountains, chandeliers of delight and more finger sandwichs than ought be allowed. Jacket and tie required.

name: Soulicious
description: SOULICIOUS & the HOPIUM DENSOULICIOUS is a space filled with laughter, beauty, gratitude, decadence and abundance. We welcome anyone off the dusty street to dance, practice healing arts or jump into an impromptu blindfolded pillowfight/winetasting/hula-hooping battle/game of tickling. Enter our Hopium Den and you might find yourself in a guided visualization, or sipping an authentic cuban mojito by resident mixologist Juan Carlos G$, or smack in da middle of the most soulful and elicit music the playa has to offer. Stop by on Friday for our famous Soulbrunch day party, where we dish up the eats, the beats and a glorious day of celebration. We live our lives with mad love and respect. We’d love to meet you.

name: SOULICIOUS & the HOPIUM DEN
description: SOULICIOUS & the HOPIUM DEN SOULICIOUS is a space filled with laughter, beauty, gratitude, decadence and abundance. We welcome anyone off the dusty street to dance, practice healing arts or jump into an impromptu blindfolded pillowfight/winetasting/hula-hooping battle/game of tickling. Enter our Hopium Den and trade Fear for Hope with our guided visualizations, Swedish yoga and some of the sexiest and most soulful music the playa has to offer. Stop by on Friday for our famous Soulbrunch day party, where we dish up the eats, the beats and a glorious day of celebration. We live our lives with mad love and respect. We’d love to meet you.

name: Sounding Spaces
description: Sounding Spaces is about letting go of your fear in an acoustic musical environment, in the spirit of play! Join us for Deep Listening exercises, conducted improvisations, holistic voice lessons, chanting, Sonic Meditations, and jam with us on our homemade instruments. Improvised, interactive, and/or pre-composed performances featured every evening, while sonic meditations will bring in the new day! Every soul needs a Space to Sound.

name: Space Cowboys
description: We’re the Space Cowboys.The Space Cowboys from Burning Man?The Black Rock Hoe Down?You know, the Unimog?Thanks, we love you too.Now in our tenth year…harder, better, faster, stronger.Yes, one more year out there, SOMEWHERE! We’ll choose an art installation to gather at on Friday night and have our infamous Black Rock Hoe Down until you cry uncle. Now, featuring MOG 2.0!  Circle the wagons and join the party and tune in to KMOG 94.1 FM.  As always, we Leave No Trace.  You do the same.  Hope to see you there.

name: Space Island
description: An island in space that doesn’t even exist.

name: Space Virgins Light Continuum
description: The Space Virgin theme camp has participated in Burning Man since 1994, out of which we have developed an active, year-round arts collective, a non-profit arts organization with a mission to develop community through large scale collaborative art projects. As a theme camp, the Space Virgins have repeatedly provided Burning Man participants with the opportunity to ritualistically cleanse themselves of their mental baggage, or re-virginize. We structure our interactive art projects to produce transformative experiences that help people let go of the anxieties and inhibitions that develop over the course of a life time, so that they might experience joy to its fullest potential. In past years we have performed revirginization rituals, provided demon workshops, created a crashed space ship from which space virgins leapt to help earthlings burn their inner demons, and burnt a sacrificial virgin goddess. We constructed a Parthenon facade as a testament to the virgin goddess, Athena, to provide a place of joy.  Last year, the Space Virgins built the Temple to the Ruined Mind to provide a place for people to act out the battle between their id and their super ego, to reflect upon the anxieties that inhibit them and reinvigorate their hedonistic, pleasure-seeking id.  This year, the Space Virgins are providing a Docking Station for weary travelers to rest and refuel.  The docking station will also house a communication link through the Tweakin’ Beacon to The Oracle on our home planet of Luminous Flux.  Come, relax, refuel, and seek the sage advice of The Oracle.

name: Spank the Monkey and the Wet Spot
description: Swing by and experience the Monkey! Spank one of our monkeys or be spanked and drink yourself to enlightenment and enjoy a spot in the shade.

name: Spike's Vampire bar
description: The time has come again to die and be reborn as an immortal child of the night in our dark den of drinks, dancing and divine decadence. From dusk until dawn you can dine on the fresh blood of our victims as it flows directly from the source. Dance until you expire to the constant melody of our coven’s extensive collection of Goth and Industrial dirges. Explore the majestic art of pole dancing on the anointed poles of our sacrificial stage. Watch as our Shamans of fire perform their mystical ceremonies of demonic revelry on our cursed stage of the flame, which is also open to any mortal, minion or master with the courage to entertain the deviant hordes.

name: Spirit Dream Interpretation Cafe
description: Standing at the crossroads of hope and fear can be perplexing at least to grippingly dark. Allow us to serve as waypoints at this nexus. Like a spiritual roadside cafe, we offer a varied menu of spirit kissed prophetic gestures to help you on your way. Spirit Dream Interpretation Cafe (formerly Camp Kingdom Come) returns for it’s sixth year bringing skilled dream interpreters in the proven ancient Hebraic tradition. In addition, we offer gifts of life through water, espresso, drum circles and a place of rest and reflexion. Welcome to a community of friends who share an atmosphere of thought and light…to give you hope for your journey into your destiny and future.

name: Spock Mountain Research Labs
description: As a group of Cyberbilly Hyperscientists we pride ourselves on the things that make us proud. We produce one of the only on-playa written and printed newspapers, distribute Hyperwhiskey(TM), and have hillbilly music when we feel like it.

name: Sporosite
description: Don’t just see the art, be the art! Visit Sporosite, where our team ofpost neo expressionist bodypainters will transform you into a walking playainstallation!

name: Starlight Express
description: What is the future? Can it be anything more than a blank stare out the window, half-mindedly watching the kids loiter in front of the bodega? Is it really a Metropolis of glistening chrome and universal health care (which, of course, no one will need in the future).

name: StarLush Lounge
description: Yes, your favorite neighborhood alien bar,is back.  The StarLush Lounge, offers a funkalicious twist to the denizens of BRC – The Famous Star Bar, DJs, great sound, Go-Go Pods, the color-pulsing dance-floor – in short, a Groovin’ Good Time!

name: Static/Dynamic Band Camp
description: Static/Dynamic Camp is the new home of the Burning Band. the Black Rock Philharmonic, and many random musical groups. We’re here to play with and for you. Come on over and make a request for a band – odds are good we can do it. You want salsa or swing? Classical or classless? We can do that. And we can do it at our camp or yours.

name: Stay Puft
description: During the chill of the night come by our burn barrel and roast a marshmellow and get warm. This years burn barrel will featrue a merry-go-round seating so that if the wind shifts you spin your self away from the smoke.  You can also stop by during the heat of the day and hang out in our chill dome and revive youself with an ice cold smoothie;  packed with all the electrolites you need to help fend off sun stoke.

name: Steam Bath Project
description: The Steam Bath Project offers Black Rock a public, wood-fired steam bath in which to cleanse and meditate. Constructed as a geodesic dome, the space is open to all hoping for relaxation and friendship.

name: Strip Jeopardy
description: Come show us what you’ve got in this battle of wits, tits, and naughty bits! Wannabe contestants must arrive an hour early. Audience participation encouraged and rewarded. Tue-Fri 4:00 PM

name: SUNRISE COFFEE CAMP
description: Come over and visit us right around sunrise. We will have some hot coffee and pastries for you. Together we will welcome in the new day and send out some good vibes for a brighter future for all.

name: Super Lucky Camp
description: Super Lucky Camp is the home of the Shrine of Maneki Neko (Super Lucky Cat). Reflect and meditate in the Great Kitty presence.

name: SurlyCamp
description: SurlyCamp, home of the SurlyBird and a bunch of assholes.

name: Sustainabilaville
description: Sustainabilaville is a camp within the AEZ that will model a way of being in social and environmental systems that helps us all live sustainably on this planet. We will create a space to be in community and learn about sustainability.

name: Tahoe Clan
description: The Lake Tahoe Clan is a group of individuals that live in the Lake Tahoe area and look to the future with HOPE.  As a group of individuals, we like to play hard and enjoy ourselves.  Stop by for a massage, accupunture, a good laugh, or to make some friends!

name: Takilma Tribe/Illuminated Fools
description: Step out of the pasture and into the future, leave your fears at the door and experience the presents like never before.  Cold beverages and a stage with gymnastic equipment will make for a hot time in the old town.

name: TangoBeso
description: TangoBeso is a dance hall provided for a variety of social dances with an emphasis on Argentine Tango.

name: Taoseños
description: Taoseños is a apart of Hushville, which not only is an aural oasis, but a visaul oasis, by requiring all vehicles to be covered or disguised

name: Tazii
description: Tazii is a chill space that welcomes folks to wander into an authentic Moroccan tent filled with flowers, candles, tapestries and ambient music each night into dawn. The tent rises from the playa floor to soar over 40’ in the air; the inside of the tent beckons with hand-sewn silk inlaid gold-colored panels that provide an ambience of romance and respite…Tazii provides a refuge for the body as well as the spirit.

name: Teletubbies Camp
description: LOVE+TECHNOLOGY=THE FUTURE: The Teletubbies lifestyle is an excellent prototype for futuristic societies–taking into account renewable energies, sophisticated technologies, and lots of love.

name: Temple of Atonement
description: Temple of Atonement: Black Rock City’s premier BDSM camp. Take part in our sanctuary of decadence as we pursue transformation, education and personal development amidst our dark fantasies.This is an opportunity for individuals to explore the darker side of their imagination: to learn more about themselves and their fantasies without fear of negative connotations, or social repercussions… It’s an opportunity for supplicants to ask, veterans to play and the curious to learn.

name: Temple of Venus
description: Come bliss out in our sanctuary for wandering Goddesses.  Visit one of our temples where the only thing a goddess has to do is relax and receive.

name: TempleWhore
description: The badass kids of TempleWhore provide Reiki, massage, herbal medicine, yoga, tantric education, weddings and adult themed events on the playa. TempleWhore is the calm in the storm of the rave and the lights and the noise of Burning Man; just another varied beauty to bliss you out and hang with your body and spirit, all served up to you with a Kali-smile and a Magdelen-kiss.

name: Terra Nova
description: The year is 4026 and Mankind has fled a decimated Earth. When fate crash-landed us upon this desolate, inhospitable moon, we had no choice but to make this our new home. Come see how our isolated culture has evolved away from the conservative, socially restrictive one our ancestors knew. Test your boundaries in the Liberation Dome, a free space where visitors can safely explore new horizons with no judgment from others. Come taste an exotic, extra-terrestrial beverage at the Terra Nova bar. We practice Sharing, Non Judgmental Acceptance of Diverse Cultures and Life Styles, Creativity, Having Fun, Nudity, Self-Reliance and Open Minded Self Improvement.

name: That Bloody Camp
description: That Bloody Camp returns with its haven of morning-after repose. We will cut through the dust of the playa and the previous night’s excesses with spicy bloody marys and even spicier servers.  And of course we will give you space to relax, connect and maybe even make a new friend.

name: The AlterVision Black Light Lounge
description: After a two-year break from “theme-ing,” Camp Steal Your Soul—the ones who produced souvenir Burning Man postcards using your photo—returns with AlterVision: An Interactive Black Light 3D Adventure.

name: The Bouncy Bouncy Club
description: The Bouncy Bouncy Club.  A jolly nice place to bounce and home of “The Wilson Phillips Pancake Breakfast”.

name: The Cathousian Transcendence
description: Seated in a gorgeous Morrocan tent, the Cathousian Transcendence offers a refreshing, replenishing, mystical retreat from the elements and celebrates joyful, empowered sensuality.  Featuring a visually stunning lounge area, visitors are refreshed by cold water, ambient North-African beats, pamperings by Priestesses, self-exploration through the writing of letters to be delivered to you in 5 years, the co-creation of a new danceform called SunSnake, and readings from the Tarot of Atlantis.

name: The Deep End
description: High Spirits, Deep Grooves

name: The Dusty Goddess
description: Get your pole-dancing groove on at the Dusty Goddess. Our open stripper pole awaits funky playa people of all sizes, shapes, genders and persuasions.

name: The Fringe
description: The Fringe goes mobile this year with its creation of a live music and performance platform unlike any other. A variety of live & evolutionary musical treats will transmigrate any auditory fear into hope and singe your Fringe. Burning man is at the Fringe of society, we will be on the Fringe of the Rednose District in 2006, pushing its musical limits.

name: The future swings on & on & on....
The Hut of the Glam-Tech Warrior
description: Before a long night riding the Disorient Express, the Glam-Tech Warrior reclines in his Hut where he keeps his wardrobe, tools and emblems of power, all presented under black light. Yes, He wears SFP 60+ at night too.

name: The Illumination Village
description: 2006 is The Illumination Villages 12th anniversary on the playa.The Illumination Village has grown into an active community of wickedly dedicated artists, and hardcore fans of fire. Were a powerful force on the playa; building, supporting and burning some of the best and biggest art the playa has ever seen. The Illumination Village is old school fire. We bring fuel, we bring energy, we bring art, and we burn it. Black Rock City loves what we do, loves that we keep the big fires burning, loves that we mix fire and steel, keeping you warm at night, and glowing throughout the year. Weve built a reputation over the years, and this year were adding powerful new legends to that legacy.

name: The Liver's End
description: Friendly neighborhood bar and source of serenity.

name: The Lost Boys
description: A cool place in the sun! Join the Lost Boys (and girls!) at our elation station. Where sublime levels of relaxation will be dolled out with rejuvinating lemonade all to the dulcit tones of Morrison. Our lemony scented, sugary sweet, phallically dispensed lemonade is yellow so yours doesn’t have to be.

name: The Lost Colony
description: 19th Century French and British colonialism meets the year 2525: intergalactic can-can dancers armed with tasers take prisoners, while Alan Quartermain look-a-likes, don their jet packs to explore the outer boundaries of the playa.

name: The Lost Penguin Cafe
description: That’s right…there are penguins in the desert. We’ve marched long and hard from the far corners of the globe to converge on our old home for the sixth year.

name: The Necklace Factory
description: The Necklace Factory is an oasis of creativity for those who need to create when they are in Black Rock City.  Fabulous materials from all over the world are provided FREE to those who choose to work in The Necklace Factory.  If you must create, please join us for a bit of shade, a tasty conversation, some intoxicating music, and the best jewelry making materials that planet Earth has to offer.

name: The Paddy Mirage
description: The “Green Man” has embodied the spirit of nature for many generations and this year the Paddy Mirage is a celebration of that spirit and its return to the forefront of consciousness. The inspirations of so much creativity has developed through the great culture of the pub in Ireland and so the Paddy Mirage will be at Burning Man, a place where sweet music and a drink in your hand give the perfect setting to be inspired and share with those around you.

name: The Philadelphia Experiment
description: Back again for the 6th year running from the City that Loves You Back, The Philadelphia Experiment brings you cool beats and cool drinks to the Playa. Come and get out of the sun and bob your head and move your feet to some soul, funk, reggae and house.

name: The Pink Flamingo Lounge
description: The Pink Flamingo Lounge is excited to be coming to the playa for her sophmore year. Big, Pink and full of life and we invite all of you to join us.  This year we will be a “happy hour” stop for all who wish to dance, hang out, get out of the sun and relax!!! Dance area, music, shade and relaxation are all yours to have at our wonderful little spot on the playa.

name: The Pink Spot
description: The Pink Spot is pink, furry and fun!  We will be providing a dome/chill area w/music during the days, and be throwing 2 parties, Wednesday and Friday at night.  Please hop on our art cars, they’re pink and furry!

name: The Playa Jazz Cafe
description: Live experimental jazz, fresh Irish coffee and a warm comfy lounge for the weary playa traveller. Welcome to The Jazz Cafe…

name: The playground
description: The Playground, (formerly the conGLOMerate, GLOM)is back Featuring the best adult toys the Playa has to offer celebrating Mayor Joey’s 11th year at the event.For many years now, our village has been rated as one of the “must see” landmarks on the Playa.This year shall prove no differently.With the reuniting of our Boise, ID. co-founders of many years ago, this year we shall celebrate a new-found fresh presentation of sights, sounds and sensations that can only be described by folks who have experienced our village in previous years.Our village is also the home base for the BurningBand that has been a long established BurningMan Icon.This will also be the last year for gASSo, the authentic desert gASS station that has thrilled hundreds of participants with it’s unusual adult features including the ORGASMATRON, The SPANK-OMATIC, ETHYL the propane enema, as well as certain other features that you’ll have to experience to believe!Our BASS (Big Ass Shade Structure) as well as the Magic Mushroom lounge provides XTRA comfy chill space with some of the best cocktails available on the Playa.If you haven’t been to us before, you must check it out and ride our attractions.If you have enjoyed us in the past, welcome back home.Joey.

name: The Prisoner Camp 2006:The Village
description: “I will not be pushed, filed, stamped, indexed, briefed, debriefed, or numbered. My life is my own.”  Is that not why we come to Burning Man?  The Village offers everything the playa dweller would want, chill space; music that will soothe, revitalize, and condition; liquid libations to liberate; games played on the trampolines; and consultations at the citizensâ€™ advice bureau.  All that is asked for in return is a little information.â€œBe seeing youâ€Ω

name: The Q
description: The Q is a multi-sensory performance art project the begins with the sense of taste and moves out through auditory, olfactory, visual and contact.

name: The Scissor Farm
description: And what a boozy cookie you will be. Let white coated exhibisionists with sharp sharp scissors dance the moonwalk on your boozy little head.  Arm yourself with holsters of toast for a sleek new canoe from The Scissor Farm.

name: The Sprawl
description: Each morning from Monday thru Friday, when youre looking for a little sunscreen fix, stop on by The Sprawls Sunscreen Station where willing hands will apply suntan lotion to your most difficult-to-reach spots.  While you enjoy the luxurious slathering, we will spoil you with scrumptious cookies and icy lemonade.   Like a day at the beach, minus the surf.

name: The Tittyman camp
description: The TittyMan is a modern day superhero.. he came to burning man with a painted motorhome and a dream to better the desert with the ultimate service…. cleansing the spirit.  Tittyman is a natural born artist and he has mastered the art of  body painting in mexico under shamen pedro chi-chi.  Through years of practice he has mastered cleansing the chest, mind, and soul.   Most of the year TittyMan is busy saving the world from the perils of evil but one week a year he takes a break to help his tribe and others by taking prints and autographs at Burning Man. Who is this masked man? Find out at titty city.  We at titty city hope to see you at the event where you can make your burning man experience history with TittyMan.

name: The Tittyman Camp
description: How did TITTY MAN begin one night I awoke and my room was glowing, a voice said "ucker wake up!! Yeah u ucker"..I think God likes to say "ucker"."I command you to Go to the desert. once there, Build a city. Build a city of TITTYS. I command you too. IF THY DOES NOT COVET THY TITTY, they will come 2 by 2," said the voice.Since 1999 I have gone to the Black Rock Desert with my dedicated tribe, because it takes a few dedicated people to build a City of Tittys. I have collected Titty prints using a special painting technique. I start first by preparing my painting surfaces by sanding and sealing 4 foot by eight foot pieces of plywood. I then paint the surfaces and frame them. These are my building blocks. I apply paint to the tittys and press them onto the boards transferring the prints onto them each titty soul then signs the prints, immortalizing them forever. I build my buildings in increments of 8 feet. Each building is 16 feet by 16 feet. Each panel locks the other panels into a rigid structure, able to withstand 70 m.p.h. wind gusts. And at night they glow under 12, 48 inch double tube black lights. Its a process of evolution, it keeps growing and changing.

name: The_Many
description: With more strange events and experiences than you can imagine, The_Many is Black Rock City’s first post-post-post-CyberPunk strip mall dedicated to the celebration of radical self-expression.  Look for the huge olive green shade structure and stop by for a complete listing of daily events.

name: Those Damn kids: JeeHawd!!
description: come get in trouble with those damn kids again as they lead the insurgency on a Domed stage full of inspired muses, producers, bands and theatrical mayhem. Expect mashup potatoes, squelchy acid electro with hip hop new york rock sensibilities, singer songwriter performances, aerialists, spontaneous chaotic episodes of jazzercized Jeehawd, as televised on Aljeezera.

name: Tierra del Fuego
description: delFuego’s Green Peace Interactive Painting Wall Available 24 Hours. Tarot and Rune Reading…Sunrise Ceremonies…Mind Blowing Body Rubs…stop on in!!!

name: Tierra delFuego
description: The Journey is the FEAR…the letting goThe burning of the vessel is the HOPE…no returningcreate yourself and give to the art…become a delFuego

name: Tomales Bay Explorers Club and Sexy Dinosaurs present: Elian Abduction Camp
description: Tomales Bay Explorers Club and Flying Dinosaurs present: Elian Abduction Camp. Viva la Revolución!

name: touch of fear village
description: touch of fear village will conduct experiments in mind control & behavorial programing thru tactile stimulation for a future fear (insert evil laugh here)

name: Tramp, Camp
description: Watch hopes rise and fall on the trampoline of life!  Its a never ending bouncing marathon at Camp Tramp, stop by and sing Jumping Jack Flash, or show us your best trampoline moves!

name: Tranquill Waters
description: Just some guys from Texas with alot of canopys and solar fountains, Im a blind mortician and because of the distance we are traveling all we can offer is a place for people to rest and enjoy each others company under shade. I was at Wood Stock 69, Burning Man 95&05/06 . We will have an art car that is located in Reno plus we will have a four person surry bicycle to be used as a burning man no rush taxi ! We are all volunteers and will help out where we can.Will have a popcorn machine running 24 hours untill nothing left to pop.

name: Transmorphagon
description: Transmorphagon – A place of change.  A space to re-arrange.  This camp-like object has as many sides as it currently has; enough to show you another side of where you are. Participants are welcomed into the environment for a lasting experience that will change with each visit. Face your fears, generate hope, and change through a random experience, a deliberate experience, and/or a casual experience. Projects like ‘The Human Trap,’ and ‘Electroshock Therapy’ surround a music space that transforms throughout the night. You are welcome to change. Face the future with a new you!

name: Trashistan
description: In 2006, we welcome the return of the rantomatic, as well as an increase in our megaphone to human ratio.

name: Triangle
description: sexy women blending raw smoothies with pedal power, so you can feel good while having the time of your life at Burning Man!

name: Tribal Thunder
description: We Like to DrinkWe Like to Drum

name: Tribe of the Crescent Star
description: In the brutal wilderness between the teeming cities of the future, along the trade routes of the Neo-Caravaners and the battle migrations of Jihadists and Jihadistas, lie the dwellings of the Tribe of the Crescent Star, sheltered in an oasis of its own construction. Welcoming all who drop their weapons and their attitude outside its perimeters, the Tribe of the Crescent Star offers their guests the comforts of a Brave Old World — for the body: cool mint tea, sweet dates, and mountains of soft pillows; for the soul: the play of light and water, and the music of paradise. By day, the order’s satin banners can be seen by weary travellers from afar; in the evening, the glow of the tent-dome serves as a beacon calling all to the night’s revels.

name: Tricycle Alley
description: No need to fear, just hope for the best! Blaze your own trail as you race from our vision of the past into the future.

name: Troglodyte
description: Dig down to your most primal memories.Troglodyte takes you back into time.The “fear” of not evolving, not advancing, not stepping into the future can be our end.The “hope” to venture beyond archaic, primitive thoughts and conciousness is what drives us.hear the drums…feel the beat…experience the journey…

name: True Mirror Palace
description: The True Mirror Palace returns to the Playa to once again reveal the true nature of those that look into a mirror that reflects unreversed images!

name: Twisted Twister
description: Twisted Twister A twisted spin on the age old game we all grew up with.

name: Two Lanterns
description: By day come by and help build the Global Village (you’ll help build a miniature clay city) or be joined in an Unofficial Playa Civil Union, in the afternoon be here for Weird Poker (no money bets!) when there is no wind, at night groove to the riddims. And don’t forget your free stuff and the Aeolian Orchid!!

name: Ultra Stunt Danger Academy
description: The Ultra Stunt Danger Academy is all about distinction.

name: Uncharted Territories
description: Enter the Uncharted Territories of Avalon Village and explore the treasures of the Hidden Ship of Souls, The Captains Mist steam chamber, find out information about Avalon Village at our Camp 411 information kiosk, and participate in our Queer Talking Circle discussion groups.

name: undecided
description: as is our hope and fear for the future, we are yet undecided.

name: V-Spot: Volunteer Here
description: Discover YOUR V-SPOT?!

name: VAMP CAMP
description: Please stop by for a multitude of experiences. Cool off on the Mr. Mister stage or get some beautiful art work done on your beautiful body or just chill out at the Vamp Camp bar. Fear nothing and hope for everything!

name: Velvet Soulmine
description: Velvet Soulmine is a continually evolving cozy chill space where you can indulge in sharing your hopes and overcoming your fears. We have created a Morracan/Asian style chill dome crossed with a contemporary mine-shaft entrance to create several different areas of the camp. In the bar you can work on your dipsophobia or amathophobia (fear of drinking & dust, cuz there’s plenty of both for you to encounter). If you are gymnophobic and or aphephobic then you must stop by to have your nude body painted. If your fear is of excess, then  the 9th Annual Southern Style Vodka party is for you, where wretched excess is never enough.

name: Vertical Camp
description: Come see the Future of Black Rock City TODAY.At Vertical Camp we answer the Burning Question–“What happens when BRC runs out of space?”The answer is simple– Go Vertical!In the age of suburban playa sprawl, come breathe the fresh air of dense urban living at it’s best. Visit our rooftop deck and check out the Man from the top of BRC’s first and finest high-rise condominium tower.Vertical Camp, where every unit has a stellar view of the Playa.

name: Videogasm
description: Camp Videogasm… A Multimedia Explosion… featuring independent / experimental video, interactive computer graphics, and live video art on our three screens, nightly at Snowflake Village. If you are a video artist with a short subject video you’d like to show, contact epoppycock@comcast.net

name: Vietnamese Iceed Coffee Camp
description: Come be refreshed with yummy caffeinated drinks! Hang out in our shaded bamboo grove while you enjoy your authentic Vietnamese Iced Coffee hot or cold.

name: Voted Best Camp
description: Skateboarding, Alcohol, Live Rock & Roll; this is punk fucking rock and make no mistake about it. We have a solid miniramp that can handle what you got, our stage can handle your band, and our bar will satisfy your most alcoholic of desires(we’re not a kids camp so forget it you little bastards).

name: Voted Best Camp
description: Skateboarding. Alcohol. Live rock & roll. There is no deep meaning to this theme camp ladies and gentlemen. Bring your appetite for booze; those underage need not apply. We will be constructing a mini skatepark for your shredding pleasure and encourage burners of any age to try their luck at riding the plywood. And the live rock and roll.  This is music of the fast and loud variety and is almost certain to be offensive. This is dirty punk rock. And those of you that will be attending the arts festival with your band are strongly encouraged to bring your gear and play our stage. We’ll have a drum kit so if you don’t want to hear your drummer cry about getting dust on his pearly kick drum, you don’t have to. We are extremely friendly and welcome everyone that seek any or all of the aforementioned thrills. We sleep in the day. And although the bar will most likely be open in the daytime, night is when we shine. Se ya there.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: VW Bus Camp welcomes all arriving on the Playa in a VW Bus or other strange and unique camping vehicle to join us, now in our 9th year at Burning Man.  In 2006 we shall conspire in The Bat Cave and play Hoops and Beer in our most beautiful VW Bus village!

name: Walk with peace
description: My Theme Village for Burning Man involves the project: Walk With Peace. A big sail will be placed on the sand in the desert in Nevada. The sail is approximately 12 meter x 6 meter. Around the sail there are severel cans with paint in all different kinds of colours, where people participating at Burning Man are invited to put there feet in the can and walk out on the sail painting their footprints for peace. The aim is to encourage people to walk with peace in mind on the sail thinking of all the people in the world, who are living in fear. The footprins on the sail will be a manifest of people walking with peace in their mind. The perspective is to bring the sail after Burning Man to places in the world, where people are living in fear. The sail should be shown for the people living here as the manifest that there is hope in the future. In this manner it is the goal that the sail will travel around the world giving hope to people living in a life with fear. This also sends a signal to the rest of the world living in peace that these people are in the need for hope for their future. Various humanitarían organisations will be contacted in order to make them facilitate the places in the world, who are in the greatest need for hope for the future. One small step for man – is one giant leap for mankind.
url: www.walkwithpeace.net (online late July 2006 - otherwise look at www.moldeqtrain.dk)

name: Wattos Junk Yard
description: The center for Light Saber Jedi action.  Come to get sabers, supplies and repairs for thursday night’s "Battle of Certainty".Jedis, Sith, Dancers, Warriors, and Generals are all welcome!

name: Wattos Junk Yard
description: A place to exchange and fix all star wars equipment.  Mainly light sabers.

name: We're Next to the Blinky Thing
description: Stuck spinning in the Sisyphean wheel of the rat race? Is that chunk of cheddar taunting and eluding your twitching, whiskered snout? Dare to step outside your comfort zone and break that cycle; come to…We’re Next to that Blinky Thing.

name: Wheeeee!villle
description: Having more fun than you since 2004!

name: Whiskey and Whores Saloon
description: The Legendary Whiskey and Whores Saloon returns to inebriate, titillate and fascinate. We got whiskey, we got whores, what else do you want. For a redneck bar it is the coolest little honky-tonk on the playa.

name: White Dragon Noodle Bar
description: Can’t remember your last hot, home-cooked meal? Stop by the WhiteDragon Noodle Bar at dinnertime for a cup of our delicious soup and asplash of our signature cocktail, the Leg Opener. Stick around forwitty banter with the bartenders and a great view from the tower.

name: WigTown
description: WigTown is a conglomeration of artists, freaks, engineers and families from San Francisco, New York City, Detroit, Kansas City, Los Angeles, London, Salt Lake City, Sacramento, Portland and even from Germany and Japan! We Invent Goofs! Witches In Green! Wherever I Guess! WIG stands for everything and everyone. Solar-powered, never gasoline! Where Intimate-clad Go for a Wednesday afternoon Lingerie Party!

name: Wind Dancer
description: The future is here and it is good! Travel from place to place with the flow of movement. Hint, like my kin did.

name: Winking Lotus
description: Winking Lotus, we’re the people behind the wink. Guided by our illustrious ringmaster, the Oracle of Teaz, we delight our guests with opulence and acts of unanticipated hospitality. Come relax with a warm cup of tea, receive guidance from the Oracle, and chill to what might be the most hypnotic and high quality sound at Black Rock City.

name: Wishing Star
description: When you see a star, do you make a wish? Do you wish for something for yourself? Someone else? Someone you love? Someone you hate? Something really big? Something smaller, and easier? Something that you can do yourself, without the aid of the wish???  Come to Camp Wishing Star, where you can make a wish which will be burned so it will ascend to join the other stars in the heavens.

name: Wonderlounge
description: Take a bunch of loco Texans, add a little San Jose love and sprinkle with Playa dust. The Wonderlounge. We’ve had y’all before, you’ll be back for more.

name: Word of Mouth BRC
description: Spanning multiple cities on the West Coast, Word of Mouth has been bringing the sound of the underground to people from all walks of life for approximately seven years. This year, Word of Mouth, in the spirit of cooperation, is teaming up with many others in the Irrational Geographic Society Village to provide quality music of multiple genres from many talented artists.

name: XEssential
description: As a collaboration between between the creators of Sol System and the collective XEssential, we bring you the SolStar, an interactive sound art installation incorporating live performance, 5.1 ambisonic surround, and sacred geometric space. Using elements of the Solarium and Sonic Runway, we will create a 5-pointed pulsating "star" that will generate a synchronized auditory and visual experience. By day, the structure will function as meditative space. By night, XEssential will create an interactive dance performance within the SolStar.

name: You Are That Pig
description: You Are That Pig Presents: You Must Be This Pig To Ride This Tall!

name: Yummy RUMInations
description: Home of the fabulous Yum Cart, the Letter Exchange, daily Rumi readings, performance art workshops and The Laughing Club.

name: Yurt Cafe
description: The Yurt Cafe will offer shady refuge in the afternoons and a library of board games like scrabble, checkers, boggle, etc.  The chef will periodically feed guests pizza or cookies from the solar ovens.

name: zakk and jack
description: loser jack and his buddy zakk try to find new vision of life

name: Zombie Dome / Cockroach Theatre
description: ZOMBIE DOME is an interactive life-after-death facility that caters to all of your sophisticated appetites.  We’ve imported the finest zombies from around the world to satisfy your undead needs.  Be advised that this is a film-documented environment.COCKROACH THEATRE invites you to take the stage; the good and the bad are welcome to share their talents.  The beautiful and the ugly are welcome to come strut their stuff.  The Cockroach Theatre troupe will also be performing a short festival of theme-oriented plays that will strike fear and inspire hope.

name: Zu
description: Zu presents Zu:Tropolis: a futurisitc micro-cosm where the animals have taken over! The kindred spirits sharing our kingdom have joined Black Rock City to create a place where an honest howl at the moon makes anything possible.
